document_data.name: ''Angurvadal''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Angurvadal''''' [[sword]]s were a set of weapons forged by the renowned [[Rashemi]] blacksmith, [[Raegik Hammerhold]]. It was unknown how many of these blades existed on [[Faerûn]], though the secrets of their creation were lost with Raegik following his death.
document_data.Powers: Like all ''[[Flame Tongue|flame tongue]]'' blades, these [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] swords were imbued with [[magic]]al fire.
document_data.History: Only Raegik and his chosen apprentice knew the unique process of crafting these magical, flaming [[blade]]s. When the famed blacksmith discovered his apprentice had been dealing with the [[Red Wizards of Thay|Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]], he got into a fight with the mages. His life, and the secret of forging an ''Angurvadal'' sword, was lost to the ages.
document_data.Notable Angurvadal Blades: * ''[[Stream of Anguish]]'': This ''+4 Angurvadal'' was the legendary sword of [[Frithiof]].
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Tusk (orc)|Tusk]]: an [[orc]] leader of [[elf]]-massacring [[Gutripper]] tribe from [[Thar]] and the brother of [[Grunt Steelstorm|Grunt "Elf" Steelstorm]], ally of the [[Hero of Daggerford]] in [[1373 DR]].
